azureLogAnalytics.query:
union isfuzzy=true
    availabilityResults,
    requests,
    exceptions,
    pageViews,
    traces,
    customEvents,
    dependencies
| where message has "New LastLogPkId" 
| order by timestamp desc
| take 1
| extend 
    secondsBefore = datetime_diff('second', now(), timestamp)
| project secondsBefore

union isfuzzy=true
    availabilityResults,
    requests,
    exceptions,
    pageViews,
    traces,
    customEvents,
    dependencies
| where message contains "New LastLogPkId"
| order by timestamp desc
| take 1
| extend LastPkId = customDimensions._lastLogPkId
| project LastPkId

traces
| extend Bet_History_Total_Replication_Time_In_MS = todecimal(customDimensions.prop__bet_history_upsert_time)
| where isnotempty(Bet_History_Total_Replication_Time_In_MS)
| project timestamp, Bet_History_Total_Replication_Time_In_MS
| order by timestamp desc

panels.title: End to End Bet History Replication Time

azureLogAnalytics.query:
traces
| extend Bet_History_Total_Replication_Time_MS = todecimal(customDimensions.prop__bet_history_replication_time)
| where isnotempty(Bet_History_Total_Replication_Time_MS)
| summarize Average_BetReplication_Time_MS = round(avg(Bet_History_Total_Replication_Time_MS), 0) 
| project-rename ["Bet History Total"] = Average_BetReplication_Time_MS

traces
| extend Bet_History_Upsert_Time_MS = todecimal(customDimensions.prop__bet_history_upsert_time)
| where isnotempty(Bet_History_Upsert_Time_MS)
| summarize 
    4_Average_Bet_History_Upsert_Time_MS = round(avg(Bet_History_Upsert_Time_MS), 0) 
| project-rename ["BetHistory Upsert"] = 4_Average_Bet_History_Upsert_Time_MS

traces
| extend Bet_To_LogBet_Replication_Time_In_MS = todecimal(customDimensions.tbs_bet_to_log_bet_time)
| where isnotempty(Bet_To_LogBet_Replication_Time_In_MS)
| summarize 1_Average_Bet_To_LogBet_Replication_Time_MS = round(avg(Bet_To_LogBet_Replication_Time_In_MS), 0)
| project-rename ["Bet to LogBet"] = 1_Average_Bet_To_LogBet_Replication_Time_MS

traces
| extend LogBet_To_TBS_Poller_Time_In_MS = todecimal(customDimensions.tbs_log_bet_poll_time)
| where isnotempty(LogBet_To_TBS_Poller_Time_In_MS)
// | project timestamp, LogBet_To_TBS_Poller_Time_In_MS
| summarize 2_Average_LogBet_To_TBS_Poller_Time_MS = round(avg(LogBet_To_TBS_Poller_Time_In_MS), 0)
| project-rename ["LogBet to TBS Poller"] = 2_Average_LogBet_To_TBS_Poller_Time_MS

traces
| extend EventHub_To_Consumer_Time_MS = todecimal(customDimensions.prop__bet_history_writerreceived_time)
| where isnotempty(EventHub_To_Consumer_Time_MS)
| summarize 3_Average_EventHub_To_Consumer_Time_MS = round(avg(EventHub_To_Consumer_Time_MS), 0)
| project-rename ["EH to BetHistory"] = 3_Average_EventHub_To_Consumer_Time_MS

traces
| extend Bet_History_Total_Replication_Time_MS = todecimal(customDimensions.prop__bet_domain_replication_time)
| where isnotempty(Bet_History_Total_Replication_Time_MS)
| summarize Average_BetReplication_Time_MS = round(avg(Bet_History_Total_Replication_Time_MS), 0) 
| project-rename ["Bet Domain Total"] = Average_BetReplication_Time_MS

traces
| extend Bet_History_Upsert_Time_MS = todecimal(customDimensions.prop__bet_domain_upsert_time)
| where isnotempty(Bet_History_Upsert_Time_MS)
| summarize 
    4_Average_Bet_History_Upsert_Time_MS = round(avg(Bet_History_Upsert_Time_MS), 0) 
| project-rename ["BetDomain Upsert"] = 4_Average_Bet_History_Upsert_Time_MS

traces
| extend EventHub_To_Consumer_Time_MS = todecimal(customDimensions.prop__bet_domain_writer_received_time)
| where isnotempty(EventHub_To_Consumer_Time_MS)
| summarize 3_Average_EventHub_To_Consumer_Time_MS = round(avg(EventHub_To_Consumer_Time_MS), 0)
| project-rename ["EH to BetDomain"] = 3_Average_EventHub_To_Consumer_Time_MS

traces
| extend Bet_History_Total_Replication_Time_In_MS = todecimal(customDimensions.prop__bet_domain_upsert_time)
| where isnotempty(Bet_History_Total_Replication_Time_In_MS)
| project timestamp, Bet_History_Total_Replication_Time_In_MS
| order by timestamp desc

panels.title: End to End Bet Domain Replication Time

azureLogAnalytics.query:
let pollerLog = dependencies
| project pollerTimestamp=timestamp, name, type, lastPKId = tostring(customDimensions.LogPKId)
| where type == "Poller_Event"
| where name == "Poller Client"
| order by pollerTimestamp desc
| take 1;
let writerLog = traces
| project writerTimestamp=timestamp, domain = customDimensions.Domain, lastPKId = tostring(customDimensions.LastPKId)
| where domain == "User"
| where lastPKId != ""
| order by writerTimestamp desc
| take 1;
print Poller = toscalar ( pollerLog ), Writer = toscalar (writerLog)

let pollerLog = dependencies
| where type == "Poller_Event"
| where name == "Poller Client"
| order by timestamp desc
| take 1
| project pollerLastPKId = customDimensions.LogPKId;
let writerLog = traces
| where customDimensions.Domain == "User"
| where customDimensions.LastPKId != ""
| order by timestamp desc
| take 1
| project customDimensions.LastPKId;
print Poller=toscalar(pollerLog), Writer=toscalar(writerLog)

let pollerLog = dependencies
| project pollerTimestamp=timestamp, name, type, lastPKId = tostring(customDimensions.LogPKId)
| where type == "Poller_Event"
| where name == "Poller Client"  // Possible values Poller Client, Poller Account, Poller ClientLimit, Poller AcTransaction, Poller ClientBankDetail, Poller ClientSelfExclusion,
| order by pollerTimestamp desc;
let writerLog = traces
| project writerTimestamp=timestamp, domain = customDimensions.Domain, lastPKId = tostring(customDimensions.LastPKId), latency = timestamp - customDimensions.LogDateTime
| where domain == "User" // Possible Valies User, Wallet, RSG, TransactionHistory, Payment
| where lastPKId != ""
| order by writerTimestamp desc;
pollerLog
| join kind=inner writerLog on lastPKId
| project
    latencyInMilliseconds = latency / time(1ms),
    writerTimestamp
| order by writerTimestamp

let pollerLog = dependencies
| project pollerTimestamp=timestamp, name, type, lastPKId = tostring(customDimensions.LogPKId)
| where type == "Poller_Event"
| where name == "Poller Account"
| order by pollerTimestamp desc
| take 1;
let writerLog = traces
| project writerTimestamp=timestamp, domain = customDimensions.Domain, lastPKId = tostring(customDimensions.LastPKId)
| where domain == "Wallet"
| where lastPKId != ""
| order by writerTimestamp desc
| take 1;
print Poller = toscalar ( pollerLog ), Writer = toscalar (writerLog)

let pollerLog = dependencies
| where type == "Poller_Event"
| where name == "Poller ClientSelfExclusion"
| order by timestamp desc
| take 1
| project pollerLastPKId = customDimensions.LogPKId;
print Poller=toscalar(pollerLog)
